lead_paragraph: The man accused of trying to bomb an airplane used a school as a pretext to legally re-enter Yemen after being recruited by Al Qaeda, the school’s director believes.
snippet: The man accused of trying to bomb an airplane used a school as a pretext to legally re-enter Yemen after being recruited by Al Qaeda, the school’s director believes.

headline.main: Nigerian May Have Used Course in Yemen as Cover
headline.print_headline: Nigerian May Have Used Course in Yemen as Cover

byline.contributor: Robert F. Worth contributed reporting from Beirut, Lebanon.
